cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Call for Tenders for the supply delivery and installation of Tools, Machinery and Equipment for the teaching of T4 subjects in post-primary schools.
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The Board of Management of Colaiste Chiarain, Leixlip, (the “Contracting Authority”) invites tenders (“Tenders”) to this call for tenders (“CFT”) from economic operators (“Tenderers”) for the supply of the goods as described in Appendix 1 to this CFT (the “Goods”). The Goods are required to be supplied and installed in Colaiste Chiarain on or before the end of February 2024, or as otherwise agreed. In summary, the Goods comprise Tools, Machinery and Equipment, based mostly on specifications by the Department of Education (DE) for the teaching of T4 subjects in post-primary schools.
